scripts._start: hexo clean && concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "GEN,SRV" -k "hexo generate -w --draft" "sleep 5; hexo server -s"
scripts._test: echo travis_fold:start:test && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:ui && istanbul report && echo travis_fold:end:test
scripts._test:backend: echo travis_fold:start:backend-tests && istanbul cover _mocha test/unit && echo travis_fold:end:backend-tests
scripts._test:frontend: echo travis_fold:start:frontend-tests && karma start && echo travis_fold:end:frontend-tests
scripts._test:ui: echo travis_fold:start:ui-tests && hexo clean && concurrently -r -s first --kill-others "hexo server --draft" "sleep 5 && wdio" && echo travis_fold:end:ui-tests
scripts._lint: hexo clean && hexo generate --debug --draft && eslint . && stylelint public/**/*.css
